document.full_text: attorneys on monday filed a civil lawsuit against the catholic archdiocese of philadelphia, already rocked by a pedophilia scandal, saying it tried to cover up sex crimes by a priest that caused his victim to attempt suicide.
document.title: new lawsuit accuses philadelphia church of sexual abuse
lines_and_colors: attorneys on monday filed a civil lawsuit against the catholic archdiocese of philadelphia, already rocked by a pedophilia scandal, saying it tried to cover up sex crimes by a priest that caused his victim to attempt suicide.
